title: Vocabulary and Questions (1 point each / 15 points)
instructions: Drag a letter from the word bank to each numbered prompt. Each letter is used exactly once.
prompts: What are the names of the oldest games ever found?
Popular game which origin came from China and then Japan?
First successful game company founded in 1860?
The name of the first true game designed to be played on a computer in 1961?
Which company did Nolan Bushnell and Ted Dabney found?
The biggest Arcade hit by Namco of 1980?
What was the VCS later renamed to?
What was Activision’s first game released in 1982?
What was Atari’s first big game hit?
The years of 1972 – 1976 for Electronic Gaming?
The years of 1983 – 1985 for Electronic Gaming?
The first home video game system?
One of the reasons why we play games?
